ComicInfo.Title: Werewolf by Night; Where Gargoyles Dwell!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Werewolf by Night: Jack learns of the family curse on his eighteenth birthday from his mother on her deathbead. Jack begins to believe that his step-father had his mother killed.
Where Gargoyles Dwell!: Venus visits the Graycar building and detects a 13th floor populated by agressive gargoyles. She fights the queen of the gargoyles and puts an end to this unnatural spook.
